summary: Remove the `CancelledError` class from the workflow library and replace it with `CancelledFailure` to maintain consistency with the Java SDK after porting the failure classes.
userImpact: Users will need to update code that catches or handles CancelledError to use CancelledFailure instead, ensuring consistency across SDKs.
rootCause: CancelledError existed before failure classes were ported from Java SDK; now redundant with CancelledFailure.
proposedFix: Remove CancelledError and use CancelledFailure for all cancellation scope cancellations.
resolutionDetails: CancelledError was removed and replaced with CancelledFailure to align with Java SDK implementation.
keyQuote: Now that we've ported the failure classes from the Java SDK we should use them.
